subject: Women
Children and Youth
Athletics and Sports
Urban Areas
Immigration and Refugees
Race
lead_paragraph: A study found that girls who are nonwhite, from immigrant backgrounds or live in urban areas are less likely to be physically active than boys, unlike children in suburban areas.
snippet: A study found that girls who are nonwhite, from immigrant backgrounds or live in urban areas are less likely to be physically active than boys, unlike children in suburban areas.
